conf.description: Pipeline to process AWS ELB logs events delivered via Lambda

functions.description: Sample events with ELB and backend HTTP status 200 at 5:1

conf.comment:
The Lambda function delivers ELB logs with all its fields extracted.

* To send to Splunk as-is (with index-time fields) disable the Eval functions below.
* To send to Splunk only raw events and rely on search-time CIM fields, enable it.

functions.description: Remove ELB native fields (index-time). Leave event/_raw intact.
